attributes.action: Create an independant body to administer, authorise, audit and investigate claims for expenses and allowances made by Members of Parliament, Councillors and other elected members of public bodies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the ongoing publicity given to expense and allowance claims made by Members of Parliament, Councillors and other elected members of public bodies, the Government should urgently consider creating a new independent body to administer, authorise, audit and where required investigate all claims for expenses and allowances paid to such persons.

This would improve the public perception of elected persons, creating a transparent system of payments made to those in public office.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
